bug.author: superbug7
bug.description: While trying to run Word2vecSentimentimentRNN example with 0.7 version, I get this error. I just moved from 0.5 on which it was working fine, but I need staticWord2vec implementation for this example to work with GPUs. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: Method isn't implemented. Please use usual Word2Vec implementation at org.deeplearning4j.models.word2vec.StaticWord2Vec.lookupTable(StaticWord2Vec.java:306) at org.deeplearning4j.examples.recurrent.word2vecsentiment.SentimentExampleIterator.(SentimentExampleIterator.java:53) at org.deeplearning4j.examples.recurrent.word2vecsentiment.Word2VecSentimentRNN.main(Word2VecSentimentRNN.java:99)

comments.comment: As far as i know issue was fixed few releases ago.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
